thread.title: Norwegian Cruise Line to Add Ship Customized for Chinese Market
thread.title_full: Norwegian Cruise Line to Add Ship Customized for Chinese Market - WSJ

author: Ezequiel Minaya
title: Norwegian Cruise Line to Add Ship Customized for Chinese Market
text:
Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. said Monday it would add its first vessel custom-made to cater to the Chinese market in 2017.
The announcement was made by Chief Executive Frank Del Rio during the CruiseWorld China summit in Shanghai. The ship has been designed specifically for the unique accommodation, cuisine and onboard entertainment needs of Chinese clients, according to a statement from the cruise line.
The new ship...
